mapper.insert: insert into t_withdraw (id, cid, uid, billNo, amount, status, add_time, username, bankname, cardNo, totaltimes, todaytimes, poundage, administrative_fee, amount_paid, vuid, vtime, rmk, remark, marking_quantity, user_quantity, issued_name, issued_time, issued_payer_id, issued_status, payer_result, issued_ip, address, cagent) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totaltimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{todaytimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{poundage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{administrativeFee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{amountPaid,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markingQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{issuedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issuedPayerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payerResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_withdraw
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
billNo = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardNo = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totaltimes = #{totaltimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
todaytimes = #{todaytimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
poundage = #{poundage,jdbcType=REAL},
administrative_fee = #{administrativeFee,jdbcType=REAL},
amount_paid = #{amountPaid,jdbcType=REAL},
vuid = #{vuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vtime = #{vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rmk = #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marking_quantity = #{markingQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
user_quantity = #{userQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
issued_name = #{issuedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issued_time = #{issuedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
issued_payer_id = #{issuedPayerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issued_status = #{issuedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payer_result = #{payerResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issued_ip = #{issuedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{cardAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cagent = #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_withdraw set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, billNo = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardNo = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totaltimes = #{totaltimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, todaytimes = #{todaytimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, poundage = #{poundage,jdbcType=REAL}, administrative_fee = #{administrativeFee,jdbcType=REAL}, amount_paid = #{amountPaid,jdbcType=REAL}, vuid = #{vuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vtime = #{vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rmk = #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marking_quantity = #{markingQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_quantity = #{userQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, issued_name = #{issuedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_time = #{issuedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, issued_payer_id = #{issuedPayerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_status = #{issuedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payer_result = #{payerResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_ip = #{issuedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{cardAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cagent = #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_withdraw WHERE status=0 AND uid=#{uid}
SELECT marking_quantity,user_quantity FROM t_user_quantity WHERE uid=#{uid}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_withdraw WHERE uid=#{uid}) as totalCounts, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_withdraw WHERE uid=#{uid} AND add_time BETWEEN date_format(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d 23:59:59') ) AS todayCounts

SELECT marking_quantity, user_quantity, winAmount, user_winAmount, t.compulsory_withdrawal_fee AS withdrawConfig, t.withdraw_fee, t.withdraw_manage_fee, free_withdraw_time, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_withdraw WHERE uid=#{uid} AND add_time > date_format(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d 0') AND status =1 ) as todaytimes FROM t_user_quantity tp LEFT JOIN t_pay_withdraw_config t ON t.cid = tp.cid WHERE tp.uid = #{uid}
